text: A pottiputki is a planting tool for putting plants to groundhttp://www.metsateho.fi/files/metsateho/tiedostot/TMH_100v_historiikki_final.pdf metsateho.fi, Historiikki s.194 It makes planting faster.Mets√§koulu s.76 kpl 4 The worker strikes the tool into the ground, and then stamps on the mechanism and the pottiputki makes a hole in the ground. A plant is then dropped in the tube of the tool, and falls into the hole. ==References== Category:Gardening tools
title: Pottiputki
